KitKat::
The autoguns keep firing on Deeplue.

DarkMouse::
"WEll, I'm going to see who's the slag that's outside."
She went out of the lab and down the hall. She went out to the 
entrance and yelled at the bot flying around. "HEY! WHY ARE YOU 
FLYING AROUND OUR BASE LIKE THAT?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, warbeacon@h... wrote:
> ::DEEPBLUE::
> ooc: i never left the ship! still flying around the ship, getting 
> missed.
> 
> ::DEEPBLUE::
> "Man those "autocannon" thingies are really hitting the ship hard, 
I 
> would fire who ever is in charge of those!"
> While in mid- air around the ship deepblue busts out a bottle of 
> chardonay.  He then smashes it on the hard steel hull.  
> "I christen this ship "The Wombat Wagon!""
> Deepblue then licks up all the chardonay that spilled when he 
smashed 
> it.   
> **continues to fly around dodgin auto gun fire.**
